tswitem.name: Miraculous Augment Resonator
tswitem.tooltip:
Miraculous Augment Resonator
An unattuned healing augment.
Resonating this augment to an active ability will increase the healing done by this ability by 8%/ 11%/ 14%/ 17%/ 20%.
To attune this augment, place it in the assembly window with:
  • 4 Attuned Mending Augment Resonators
  • 60 Pure metal
  • 60 Pure dust
